example.text: the sudden reappearance of stock-market turbulence

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the reappearance of an old flame , David , a film critic and actor who always seems to be just on the brink of stardom
example.arg: of an old flame , David , a film critic and actor who always seems to be just on the brink of stardom
